FOR THE SUCCESSFUL For Weezer lead guitarist Brian Bell , performing`` Say It Ain't So'' in front of a live studio audience on`` Late Show With David Letterman '' was a surreal experience. Playing on TV for the first time when you're in your 20s, it's just bizarre, recalled Brian Bell .`` There's a lot of pressure when you're young.''
